channel.title: Lunation - 24/7 - VPS Protected - Great Community - Lots to do!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2wlv5sh.jpg[/img]
[center]Lunation is a 317 loading 634 with tons of minigames and a great community we work together to help people have the best experience possible.[/center]
[center][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?f144hj40yh1npjt]Download[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.Lunation317.webs.com]Website[/url][/center] [center][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OOUUof8p3Yw&feature=plcp]Promo[/url][/center]
[center]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y2cg6WPTlrc[/center]
[size=18pt]FIRST 20 PLAYERS GET A SPECIAL ITEM! PM Coffee Bean saying "CFBN" TO CLAIM YOUR REWARD![/size]
[center]But There's So Many Other Server's Why Choose Lunation?
- 24/7 With The Most Amazing Pking Ever - We Do Not Tolerate Any Non Sense From Staff - When You Donate You Get Recoginized And Lots Of Benefits - VPS Managed 24/7 and Anti-DDoS - We Listen To Our Players, Unlike Some Other RSPS's Out There - We Try To Make Players Have The Best Time Possible - Daily Events! - Active Updates! - And Lots More! - Unlike some servers that close down after 1 month of failing, we will never stop until we hit number 1.[/center]
[center]Still arent convinced you should join? Check out our media:[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/30hooqt.png[/img][/center] [center]MINIGAMES+MORE[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/35a25jq.png[/img][/center] [center]PKING![/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2iroimx.png[/img][/center] [center]STAKING WITH ZERO DUPES AS OF 10/25/2012[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/50nsd5.png[/img][/center] [center]WORKING GODWARS AND TONS OF BOSSES[/center]
[center][size=18pt]We are constantly try to improve our server on a daily basis, we understand there are many servers out there that can say this same thing, but we are diffrent unlike them. We actually mean it.[/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt]Website[/size]: [url=http://[size=18pt]http://www.lunation317.webs.com[/url] [size=18pt]Temporary until i purchase a domain.[/size][/center]
